attributes.action: Keep schools closed until it is safe for our children they are not test subjects
attributes.additional_details: Stop the plan to open schools until September when it is safe the kids are all missing so no child is behind the rest in their respective years, our children our the most important thing, education is secondary to health and safety which is the primary mandate for the United Kingdom
attributes.background: You are wanting to open primary schools and have kids back in which is putting our future generation at risk simply for money for which you will be increasing taxes anyway its not your money it's the tax payers who will pay for this in the end either way so stop acting like it's your personal money.
